name: Air Burst
description: Dash forward on a burst of air!

name: Airborne Slam
description: Rocket into the sky on an air jet before slamming into the ground to create a violent burst of wind!

name: Breaking Twister
description: Unleash a slow moving burst of air that slows and damages all nearby enemies!

name: Fading Petal
description: Draw in and slow all enemies in an area!

name: Air Spinner
description: Throw a disc of air into orbit around you!

name: Blurring Falconry
description: Hurl a falcon of wind that repeatedly assails the first enemy it strikes!

name: Furious Tempest
description: Hold to charge up and release a stormy ball of wind that implodes at maximum charge!

name: Gale-force Alignment
description: Unleash a flowing burst of wind that forcefully lines up foes it strikes!

name: Cyclone Boomerang
description: Hurl a rapidly revolving air current that returns to you!

name: Dragon Blast
description: Summon a dragon formed of wind to draw in enemies before blasting them away!

name: Gust Burst
description: Dash forward with such force that enemies in the area are pulled into your wake!

name: Gust Volley
description: Release a volley of piercing winds in a cone!

name: Heroic Leap
description: Designed by Virtuoso Michael Belloy, this arcana allows you to seize a foe and leap high into the air before crashing down!

name: Evading Zephyr
description: Summon a current of air that causes all incoming attacks to miss while you are moving or using basic arcana!

name: Mach Stunner
description: Fire off a series of sound waves that stun any enemies they strike!

name: Mentis Imperium
description: Designed by Virtuoso Claire Astrid, this arcana allows you to confuse foes around you, causing them to attack each other!

name: Perforating Jet
description: Release piercing jet streams of air!

name: Spiraling Typhoon
description: Draw in foes with a ring of tumbling winds before striking them away!

name: Razor Burst
description: Dash forward and create a vortex of cutting winds!

name: Rushing Typhoon
description: Fly forward with a ring of tumbling winds that locks onto the first enemy struck!

name: Scales of Babylon
description: Designed by Virtuoso Sean 'Ariamaki' Riedinger, this arcana allows you to lower active cooldowns and steal speed from enemies by blasting them with a burst of air!

name: Storm Draft
description: Release a burst of air that drafts foes and stuns them against walls!

name: Severing Slash
description: Unleash a barrage of cutting winds! Can be charged for boosted effect!

name: Shearing Chain
description: Rush forward while unleashing a flurry of wind slashes!

name: Tearing Whirlwind
description: Rapidly spin forward and pull nearby enemies into your wake!

name: Vacuum Seekers
description: Summon a trio of seekers that home in on enemies and implode on contact, drawing in nearby foes!

name: Whirling Tornado
description: Unleash a protective vortex of fierce winds!

name: Vortex Trap
description: Dash forward, leaving behind a wind trap that propels nearby enemies into the direction of your dash!

name: Vortex Veil
description: Surrounds you with a ring of vortex winds that damage and knockback enemies!

name: Ward of Winds
description: Summon a ward of air that slows enemies and increases all air damage done in the area!

name: Whirling Wind Agent
description: Conjure an agent of wind that buffets foes with whirling winds!

name: Wind Flurry
description: Unleash a quick salvo of cutting winds!

name: Wind Slash
description: Summon arcs of slashing wind!

name: Wind Sentry
description: Throw a projectile that shoots enemies in the area!

name: Absolute Finale
description: Throws out an orb of primal chaos that erases the first enemy hit from existence! Enemies that cannot be erased will take heavy damage instead.

name: Chaotic Rift
description: Dash through a rift torn open by primal chaos!

name: Arcane Intervention
description: Designed by Virtuoso Kaleb Daugherty, this arcana allows you teleport all nearby enemies into a chaos storm!

name: Chaos Crusher
description: Create a chaotic rift to strike foes before compressing it and firing it forward!

name: Chaos Reaper
description: Slice through enemies with a scythe made of Chaos energy! Can be charged for boosted effect!

name: Chaotic Buster
description: Hold to charge up and release an unstable cluster of chaos orbs that unleashes a barrage of strikes on any enemy hit!

name: Chaotic Echoes
description: Summon an offensive barrier around you as you dash! Project two spectral copies of yourself that attack in the direction of your next dash!

name: Distortion Beam
description: Summon a beam of chaos energy!

name: Dragon Fall
description: Call down a chaos dragon to crash down from the skies! This arcana absorbs other dragon arcana!

name: Gravity Onslaught
description: Lunge forward and strike all enemies a blast of graviton energy, causing them to bounce around while taking damage!

name: Piercing Void
description: Summon a field of void blades that rain down on foes!

name: Ward of Chaos
description: Form a ward of chaos that lobs orbs of imploding energy at nearby enemies and increases all damage done in the area!

name: Mark of Discord
description: Hurl a lance of chaos that calls down chaotic retribution on impact!

name: Mortal Coil
description: Designed by Virtuoso Nathan 'MortisXII' Cannell, this arcana allows you to impale all enemies in a line with a spear of chaos and drag them to you!

name: Null Flash Agent
description: Conjure a pair of agents that unleash a series of directed blasts on nearby enemies!

name: Null Parade
description: Throw out a cluster of chaos orbs that explode on landing!

name: Phantom Brigade
description: Summon a legion of Chaos Knights that rush forth and attack enemies!

name: Phantom Squadron
description: Summon a legion of Chaos Lancers that take to the skies and crash down on enemies!

name: Aegis Charge
description: Shield incoming attacks as you charge forward, stunning enemies in your path!

name: Bladed Vine
description: Repeatedly whip a bladed vine to slash foes!

name: Dragon Dive
description: Summon a tunneling dragon that drives away foes!

name: Earth Knuckles
description: Pummel foes with gigantic earth fists!

name: Earth Stomp Agent
description: Conjure an agent of earth that crushes foes!

name: Earthquake Axe
description: Hurl a giant stone axe into the air that crashes down on enemies!

name: Fadeaway Rhythm
description: Mark foes with a series of rocky strikes that explode as you leap back!

name: Embracing Vines
description: Cultivate a row of entwining vines that roots foes!

name: Entangling Vines
description: Summon a set of vines that pull nearby enemies close to you!

name: Earthen Aegis
description: Form a protective ring of stone shields!

name: Obsidian Cascade
description: Unleash a cascade of obsidian daggers!

name: Grasping Earth
description: Designed by Virtuoso Laurent Sweert, this arcana allows you to grasp all foes in the area with giant stone fists!

name: Hammer of Atlas
description: Solidify a giant hammer of stone and whirl it about before hurling it forward!

name: Prickly Ballet
description: Summon a cactus familiar that unleashes a spikey barrage of needles!

name: Magnetic Follow-up
description: Generates a magnetic aura that causes basic arcana to hurl stone projectiles!

name: Obsidian Splitter
description: Swing a massive battle axe that covers a wide area! Can be charged for boosted effect!

name: Razor Petals
description: Throws out a flower that spins in place before returning to you!

name: Knockout Boulder
description: Hurl a boulder that

name: Rippling Rupture
description: Rupture the earth with rapidly tunneling vines to continually damage enemies in a line!

name: Seismic Entry
description: Launch into the air and crash down on all nearby foes to stun them!

name: Rock n' Roll
description: Summon a pair of rocky buzzsaws that tear forward!

name: Rock-solid Tomahawk
description: Summon and hurl a stone tomahawk at your foes! Can be used repeatedly for a short duration.

name: Shattering Strike
description: Strike a boulder to shatter it into a ring of shrapnel!

name: Stone Seekers
description: Summon a pair of seekers that homes in on and stomp on nearby enemies!

name: Snare Track
description: Tear forward as a trio of vines entangle enemies in your wake!

name: Stalwart Defenders
description: Designed by Virtuosos Shamrock63 and Slamuel, this arcana allows you to form a quartet of chess knights that leap to your defense!

name: Spike Track
description: Tear forward and leave behind a trail of earthen spikes!

name: Stone Shot
description: Rapidly fire stones!

name: Terra Ring
description: Pulverize the ground to summon cascading rings of earth spikes!

name: Toxic Trap
description: Tear forward while throwing behind a toxic bomb that poisons foes!

name: Tectonic Drill
description: Drive forward and rock enemies with a giant drill made of stone!

name: Toxic Bolas
description: Hurl bolas made of toxic vines to entangle and poison foes!

name: Violent Thornstorm
description: Hold to charge up and release a bundle of thorny vines that explode into caltrops at maximum charge!

name: Ward of Stones
description: Form a ward of earth that periodically stuns foes and increases all earth damage done in the area!

name: Blazing Lariat
description: Spin forward while swinging a blazing whip of flames!

name: Blazing Blitz
description: Dash forward and pummel a foe with barrage of fiery punches!

name: Blazing Onslaught
description: Dash forward, grabbing all enemies in your path before unleashing an onslaught of fireballs!

name: Blazing Vault
description: Blast into the air and come crashing down into a fiery explosion!

name: Bouncing Blaze
description: Fling bouncing balls of fire!

name: Engulfing Fissure
description: Strike the ground, creating a burning fissure that ensnares nearby enemies!

name: Burn Cycle
description: Unleashes a fiery combo that ends with a flaming punch!

name: Crashing Meteor
description: Call down a meteor from the skies!

name: Dragon Arc
description: Summon a torrent of fiery dragons!

name: Exploding Fireball
description: Fire a massive fireball that explodes on impact!

name: Fiery Yo-yo
description: Hurl flaming orbs that fly out and return to you!

name: Explosive Charge
description: Charge through enemies, marking them with a timed explosive!

name: Flame Breath
description: Blast away enemies with a breath of fire!

name: Fire Wall
description: Ignite the ground to create a blazing trail of flames!

name: Flame Cleaver
description: Carve out a wave of flames that ignites all enemies in its path!

name: Flame Strike
description: Blast enemies away with plumes of flames!

name: Flame Seekers
description: Summon a pair of seekers that home in on nearby enemies and explode on contact!

name: Flare Rush
description: Rush forward and conjure a volley of accompanying flares!

name: Flame Cross
description: Fire off waves of criss crossing flames!

name: Flame Fusion
description: Fire off a fireball, followed by a flaming arrow that can be fused to release a burst of arrows!

name: Fuelled Berserk
description: Enter a burning rage that speeds up basic arcana!

name: Ignition Drive
description: Blast enemies away with a chain of explosions!

name: Heroic Blaze
description: Spiral into the sky while a flaming vortex draws in nearby foes!

name: Homing Flares
description: Ignite a halo of flares that home in on the nearest foe!

name: Ignition Rush
description: Rush forward and ignite a fiery aura around you that burns foes you come into contact with!

name: Raging Inferno
description: Hold to charge up and release an expanding ball of fire that explodes at maximum charge!

name: Rapid Fire Agent
description: Conjure an agent of fire that engages foes with a rapid barrage of fireballs!

name: Inferno Cannon
description: Burst forward with a scorching lunge before blasting away enemies with a round of burning flames!

name: Magma Rush
description: Summon explosive mines that home in on nearby enemies!

name: Searing Crown
description: Blast away enemies around you with a burning halo of flames!

name: Inferno Beam
description: Unleash a pair of criss-crossing fire beams that damage and burn enemies!

name: Searing Rush
description: Rush forward and leave flames in your wake!

name: Tracer Barrage
description: Fire off a volley of arcing tracers that return to you!

name: Ward of Flames
description: Form a ward of fire that damages enemies and increases all fire damage done in the area!

name: Arc Sphere
description: Generate a stationary sphere of arcing current!

name: Ball Lightning
description: Hold to charge up and release a devastating ball of lightning that shocks at maximum charge!

name: Bolt Rail
description: Direct a short stream of lightning!

name: Bouncing Surge
description: Conjure a spear of lightning that bounces between enemies!

name: Bolt Claymore
description: Release a charged orb that can be detonated to strike all nearby foes with lightning!

name: Dragon Circuit
description: Summon a dragon that speeds along a circuit before crashing down on the enemy!

name: Circuit Line
description: Jolt ahead, leaving behind electric orbs that are chained together after a short delay!

name: Dynamic Disarray
description: Release a shower of sparks that bounce off any enemies they strike!

name: Deferred Dynamo
description: Send out an electric orb that fires a continuous lightning stream at the first enemy it strikes!

name: Ion Spike
description: Generate a charged orb that syncs up with nearby orbs before releasing a stream of lightning!

name: Radiant Blast
description: Release a surge of electric energy in a circular area! Can be charged for boosted effect!

name: Magnetic Breakers
description: Fire off a pair of magnetized orbs that fly forward while bouncing off of each other!

name: Laced Lightning
description: Summon a ring of lightning pins with a shocking current that laces them together!

name: Lightning Aspect
description: Generate a field of electricity that shocks enemies that you come into contact with!

name: Line Shock Agent
description: Conjure an agent of lightning that assaults foes with a stream of lightning!

name: Shock Assault
description: Ride a bolt of lightning to shock foes in the area!

name: Magsphere
description: Designed by Virtuoso David Gottsegen, this arcana allows you to pull all nearby projectiles into an orbit around you!

name: Shock Line
description: Jolt ahead and leave behind a line of shocking current!

name: Shock Nova
description: Hold to charge up and release an explosion of electricity that shocks all foes in the area at maximum charge!

name: Shock Wire
description: Throw out a wire of current that shocks any enemies that it comes into contact with!

name: Spark Contact
description: Jolt foes with a burst of electricity!

name: Star Bolt
description: Hurl an electrified star that shocks any enemy it strikes!

name: Surge Anchor
description: Throws out an anchor that generates a surge of lightning between you and the anchor!

name: Thunder Seekers
description: Summon a pair of seekers that homes in on and shock nearby enemies!

name: Spark Array
description: Form a double weave of shocking sparks that slowly move outward!

name: Thunder Line
description: Jolt ahead as a burst of lightning shocks foes in the area!

name: Thundering Chain
description: Generate a series of lightning strikes that shock foes!

name: Thunder Drop
description: Volt into the sky before crashing down on a bolt of lightning to shock all foes in the area!

name: Volt Tracer
description: Summon an electrified afterimage that tracks your path and explodes when it catches up to you!

name: Aqua Arc
description: Direct an arcing stream of water!

name: Voltaic Needle
description: Dart forward and pin all foes in your path with a piercing lightning needle!

name: Twin Turbines
description: Throw out a rapidly revolving turbine that splits and creates streams of lightning while returning to you!

name: Ward of Lightning
description: Summon a lightning ward that shocks foes randomly and increases all lightning damage done in the area!

name: Volt Disc
description: Discharge an electric disc that bursts before dissipating!

name: Volt Pinball
description: Generate a protective ring of charged orbs that ricochet from foe to foe!

name: Aqua Beam
description: Unleash a torrent of water to blast away enemies!

name: Aqua Breaker
description: Hold to charge up and release a rapidly spinning ball of water that creates an explosive deluge at maximum charge!

name: Aqua Vortex
description: Summon swirling currents of water that envelop you!

name: Binary Splashdown
description: Throw out a burst of water that draws in foes before blasting into the sky and splashing down!

name: Bouncing Bubble
description: Throw out a bubble of water that bounces every time it strikes an enemy or wall!

name: Bubble Barrage
description: Rapidly fire a stream of explosive bubbles!

name: Bubble Blast
description: Surround yourself in a flurry of bubbles!

name: Calming Flow
description: Enter a calming state where every last hit of your basic arcana lowers all cooldowns!

name: Cardice Prime
description: Conjure a rapidly revolving ring of icy blades!

name: Cascading Blitz
description: Blasts out a chain of water blobs before using them to pummel foes with a series of blows!

name: Creeping Tendrils
description: Designed by Virtuoso Verdestrom, this arcana creates a tendril of water that binds and travels to any foes it hits!

name: Frozen Bait
description: Lob a frozen decoy that lures in foes and giant sharks alike!

name: Frost Feint
description: Race forward while leaving behind a frozen decoy!

name: Dragon Surge
description: Unleash a pair of watery dragons that track and assault your foes!

name: Frost Blade
description: Summons icy blades that cut through enemies! Can be charged for boosted effect!

name: Frost Fan
description: Throw out a fan of frost daggers that freeze enemies!

name: Frost Scimitar
description: Throw out a rapidly spinning sword that slowly returns to you as it slices enemies in its path!

name: Frost Wing
description: Race forward on frozen wings that unleash a cone of freezing feathers behind you!

name: Ice Dagger
description: Pierce foes with conjured ice daggers!

name: Glacial Cross
description: Dash forward and conjure a colossal frozen fist to strike foes!

name: Ice Seekers
description: Summon a trio of seekers that home in on and freeze nearby enemies!

name: Tidal Blast
description: Pull in enemies with a series of water balls before blasting them away with a massive deluge!

name: Ward of Frost
description: Form a ward of frost that periodically freezes foes and increases all water damage done in the area!

name: Perfect Storm
description: Summon a storm of hail and ice shards that rains down on foes!

name: Rebounding Icicles
description: Conjure a series of icicles that cascade out and return to you!

name: Rip Tide
description: Unleashes a trio of water ripples!

name: Snowflake Chakrams
description: Conjure snowflake chakrams that orbit outwards!

name: Ice Spear
description: Conjure a spear of ice that impales foes and freezes them against walls!

name: Water Pulse Agent
description: Conjure an agent of water that douses foes with a spread of water blobs!

name: Wave Front
description: Race forward while enveloped in a watery globe that briefly shields you!

name: Water Prison
description: Fire off a prison of water that envelops the first enemy it strikes!
